long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your YouTube watchtime and visualize fun statistics!

TubeTime gives you insight into:
- Video replay counts
- Weekly, monthly, and yearly watchtime
- Average watchtime
- Ad time watched
- Video genre breakdown
- Total videos watched
- Total channels watched
- Top channels by watchtime
- Activity by time of day
- Most active time of day
- Highest watchtime

Source code available here: https://github.com/ksucpea/tubetime
